data.enText: wanting to know more
the feeling that you have when you want to know or learn more about sb/sth

data.chText: 对…感到 / 表现出 / 表示关注
data.enText: to feel/have/show/express (an) interest in sth

data.chText: 你的父母有兴趣了解你的朋友吗？
data.enText: Do your parents take an interest in your friends?

data.chText: 那时我已经对此想法（完全）失去兴趣了。
data.enText: By that time I had lost (all) interest in the idea.
I watched with interest .

data.chText: 我想知道，晚会是什么时间结束的？
data.enText: As a matter of interest , (= I'd like to know) what time did the party finish?

data.chText: 我只是好奇问问，这个花了你多少钱？
data.enText: Just out of interest , how much did it cost?
attraction

data.chText: 引人关注的性质；吸引力；趣味
data.enText: the quality that sth has when it attracts sb's attention or makes them want to know more about it

data.chText: 这座城市附近有许多有意思的地方。
data.enText: There are many places of interest near the city.

data.chText: 我对此课题一点也不感兴趣。
data.enText: The subject is of no interest to me at all.

data.chText: 这些植物在冬季会给你的花园增添胜景。
data.enText: These plants will add interest to your garden in winter.
hobby
an activity or a subject that you enjoy and that you spend your free time doing or studying

data.chText: 她的主要爱好是音乐和网球。
data.enText: Her main interests are music and tennis.

data.chText: 他是个有广泛业余爱好的人。
data.enText: He was a man of wide interests outside his work.
money
the extra money that you pay back when you borrow money or that you receive when you invest money
to pay interest on a loan
The money was repaid with interest .
interest charges/payments
Interest rates have risen by 1%.
high rates of interest
advantage
a good result or an advantage for sb/sth

data.chText: 为某人的利益游说；保护 / 维护某人的利益
data.enText: to promote/protect/safeguard sb's interests

data.chText: 她所做的完全是为了自己的好处。
data.enText: She was acting entirely in her own interests .

data.chText: 这些改革对地方政府最有利。
data.enText: These reforms were in the best interests of local government.

data.chText: 公开这些真相是为了公众的利益。
data.enText: It is in the public interest that these facts are made known.
share in business

data.chText: （企业或公司的）股份；权益；股权
data.enText: a share in a business or company and its profits

data.chText: 她在法国拥有企业权益。
data.enText: She has business interests in France.
American interests in Europe (= money invested in European countries)
connection
a connection with sth which affects your attitude to it, especially because you may benefit from it in some way

data.chText: 到了这个时候，我应该申明我的利益关系。
data.enText: I should, at this point, declare my interest .

data.chText: 各机构皆知获利之道在于确保员工士气高昂。
data.enText: Organizations have an interest in ensuring that employee motivation is high.
group of people

data.chText: 同行；同业；利害与共者；利益团体
data.enText: a group of people who are in the same business or who share the same aims which they want to protect
powerful farming interests

data.chText: 地方政府和企业团体之间的关系
data.enText: relationships between local government and business interests
have sb's interests at heart

data.chText: 关心…的幸福成功；暗暗地替…着想
data.enText: to want sb to be happy and successful even though your actions may not show this
in the interest(s) of sth
in order to help or achieve sth
In the interest(s) of safety, smoking is forbidden.
to do sth (back) with interest
to do the same thing to sb as they have done to you, but with more force, enthusiasm, etc.
conflict of interest(s)
a situation in which there are two jobs, aims, roles, etc. and it is not possible for both of them to be treated equally and fairly at the same time

data.chText: 他的商务交往与政治活动之间存在着利益冲突。
data.enText: There was a conflict of interest between his business dealings and his political activities.
to attract your attention and make you feel interested; to make yourself give your attention to sth
Politics doesn't interest me.
She has always interested herself in charity work.

data.chText: 或许你有兴趣知道，安迪没有接受这份工作。

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+带to的不定式

data.enText: It may interest you to know that Andy didn't accept the job.
interest sb in sth
to persuade sb to buy, do or eat sth

data.chText: 先生，请你瞧瞧这个型号好吗？
data.enText: Could I interest you in this model, Sir?

data.chText: 以上各词均涉及闲暇活动。
data.enText: These are all words for activities that you do for pleasure in your spare time.
interest

data.chText: 指业余爱好（活动或科目）：
data.enText: an activity or subject that you do or study for pleasure in your spare time

data.chText: 她的主要爱好是音乐和园艺。
data.enText: Her main interests are music and gardening.
hobby
an activity that you do for pleasure in your spare time
His hobbies include swimming and cooking.
game
a children's activity when they play with toys, pretend to be sb else, etc.; an activity that you do to have fun
a game of cops and robbers
He was playing games with the dog.
pastime
an activity that people do for pleasure in their spare time

data.chText: 在法国，下馆子是全国人普遍的消遣活动。
data.enText: Eating out is the national pastime in France.
A hobby is often more active than an interest .

data.chText: 他的主要业余爱好是踢足球（他踢足球）。
data.enText: His main hobby is football (= he plays football) .

data.chText: 他的主要业余爱好是足球（他看足球赛和阅读有关足球的消息，但不一定踢足球）。
data.enText: His main interest is football (= he watches and reads about football, and may or may not play it) .

data.chText: pastime泛指一般人的消遣活动，指自己或个人的业余爱好较常用interest或hobby：
data.enText: Pastime is used when talking about people in general; when you are talking about yourself or an individual person it is more usual to use interest or hobby .
Eating out is the national interest/hobby in France.
Do you have any pastimes?
interest, hobby or pastime?
a popular interest/hobby/pastime
Do you have any interests/hobbies?
to take up/pursue a(n) interest/hobby
to do sth as a hobby

ex.zh: 很大的兴趣（或利益关系）
几乎没有兴趣（或利益关系）
很强的兴趣（或利益关系）

data.enText: have sb's interests at heart

data.chText: 关心…的幸福成功；暗暗地替…着想
data.enText: to want sb to be happy and successful even though your actions may not show this
in the interest(s) of sth
in order to help or achieve sth
In the interest(s) of safety, smoking is forbidden.
to do sth (back) with interest
to do the same thing to sb as they have done to you, but with more force, enthusiasm, etc.
conflict of interest(s)
a situation in which there are two jobs, aims, roles, etc. and it is not possible for both of them to be treated equally and fairly at the same time

data.chText: 他的商务交往与政治活动之间存在着利益冲突。
data.enText: There was a conflict of interest between his business dealings and his political activities.
interest sb in sth
to persuade sb to buy, do or eat sth

data.chText: 先生，请你瞧瞧这个型号好吗？
data.enText: Could I interest you in this model, Sir?

tr: a diversion that occupies one's time and thoughts (usually pleasantly)
example: he counts reading among his interests
they criticized the boy for his limited pursuits

tr: a reason for wanting something done
example: died for the sake of his country

tr: the power of attracting or holding one's attention (because it is unusual or exciting etc.)
example: they said nothing of great interest
primary colors can add interest to a room

tr: a sense of concern with and curiosity about someone or something
(usually plural) a social group whose members control some field of activity and who have common aims
example: the iron interests stepped up production

tr: (law) a right or legal share of something
example: they have interests all over the world
a stake in the company's future

tr: a fixed charge for borrowing money
usually a percentage of the amount borrowed
example: how much interest do you pay on your mortgage?
I worry about the second Germanic consonant shift

value.def: If you have an interest in something, you want to learn or hear more about it.

example.ex: There has been a lively interest in the elections in the last two weeks...
example.tran: 近两周来选举受到了热烈关注。

example.ex: His parents tried to discourage his interest in music, but he persisted...
example.tran: 他的父母设法打消他对音乐的兴趣,但他始终坚持。

example.ex: She'd liked him at first, but soon lost interest...
example.tran: 她刚开始是喜欢他，但很快就失去了兴趣。

example.ex: Food was of no interest to her at all.
example.tran: 食物一点都提不起她的兴趣。

value.def: Your interests are the things that you enjoy doing.

example.ex: Encourage your child in her interests and hobbies even if they're things that you know little about...
example.tran: 要鼓励孩子的兴趣爱好，即使你对它们所知甚少。

example.ex: He developed a wide range of sporting interests as a pupil at Millfield.
example.tran: 他在米尔菲尔德私立学校上学的时候培养了广泛的运动爱好。

value.def: If something interests you, it attracts your attention so that you want to learn or hear more about it or continue doing it.

example.ex: That passage interested me because it seems to parallel very closely what you're doing in the novel...
example.tran: 那一段引起了我的关注，因为它似乎与你在小说里所采用的手法非常相似。

example.ex: It may interest you to know that Miss Woods, the housekeeper, witnessed the attack.
example.tran: 您或许会有兴趣知道管家伍兹小姐目击了袭击过程。

value.def: If you are trying to persuade someone to buy or do something, you can say that you are trying to interest them in it.

example.ex: In the meantime I can't interest you in a new car, I suppose?...
example.tran: 那么我想这时候我不能说服您买辆新车了？

example.ex: The group wasn't able to interest them in reproducing literature specifically for women.
example.tran: 这个团体没能说服他们再版专门面向女性的文学作品。

value.def: If something is in the interests of a particular person or group, it will benefit them in some way.

example.ex: Did those directors act in the best interests of their club?...
example.tran: 那些董事行事时是以他们俱乐部的最大利益为出发点吗？

example.ex: The social worker would try to get her to see she was acting against the boy's interests.
example.tran: 这位社会工作者会设法让她明白她这么做对这个男孩没有好处。

gramarinfo.label: usu pl, usu <l>in</l> N with poss

value.def: You can use interests to refer to groups of people who you think use their power or money to benefit themselves.

example.ex: The government accused unnamed 'foreign interests' of inciting the trouble...
example.tran: 政府不指名地谴责“外国利益集团”煽动骚乱。

example.ex: He resigned as finance minister only weeks before the election and stood against big-business interests.
example.tran: 他在大选到来仅几周前辞去了财政部长职务,并抵制大公司利益集团。

value.def: A person or organization that has interests in a company or in a particular type of business owns shares in this company or this type of business.

example.ex: Her other business interests include a theme park in Scandinavia and hotels in the West Country.
example.tran: 她其他的公司股权包括斯堪的纳维亚的一个主题游乐园和英格兰西南部的几家酒店。

example.ex: ...the Hatch family, who controlled large dairy interests...
example.tran: 掌控大量奶业股权的哈奇家族

example.ex: Disney will retain a 51 percent controlling interest in the venture.
example.tran: 迪斯尼将保留该项目 51% 的控股权。

value.def: If a person, country, or organization has an interest in a possible event or situation, they want that event or situation to happen because they are likely to benefit from it.

example.ex: The West has an interest in promoting democratic forces in Eastern Europe...
example.tran: 东欧民主力量的发展与西方国家利害攸关。

example.ex: Domestic consumers of petroleum products have an interest in a secure source of petroleum products.
example.tran: 石油产品的国内消费者希望其来源能够获得保障。

value.def: Interest is extra money that you receive if you have invested a sum of money. Interest is also the extra money that you pay if you have borrowed money or are buying something on credit.

example.ex: Does your current account pay interest?...
example.tran: 你的活期账户有利息吗？

example.ex: This is an important step toward lower interest rates.
example.tran: 这是向较低利率迈出的重要一步。

value.def: If you do something in the interests of a particular result or situation, you do it in order to achieve that result or maintain that situation.

example.ex: ...a call for all businessmen to work together in the interests of national stability.
example.tran: 呼吁所有商人为了国家稳定而团结协作

value.tran: 为了（或符合)…的利益;有助于

trans: 使（某人）对…产生兴趣；使（某人）对…热心
共同利害关系，共同利益
很强的兴趣（或利益关系）
